price: خو د جنت خلك به هغه ورځ هم د هستوګنځي له پلوه ښه وي او هم به د غرمې دمه ځاى له پلوه ډېر غوره وي.
arabic: أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَيۡرٞ مُّسۡتَقَرّٗا وَأَحۡسَنُ مَقِيلٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: aṣḥābu al-janati yawma-idhin khayrun mus'taqarran wa-aḥsanu maqīlan
